title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Contributed to the development of a B2B/SaaS Product - [SnowSEO 2.0](https://snowseo.com) with the founder with managed to become [#2 Product of the Day](https://www.producthunt.com/products/snowseo). Wrote optimized and scalable production-ready code with CI/CD Pipelines. Main Tech Stack: Nextjs, Typescript, tRPC, TailwindCSS, Docker, Redis.

title: SDE Intern
description: Worked mainly in the frontend and rebuilt the whole theme of the website according to the Figma from the Design Team to make it more user-friendly and lay the foundations for expanding the features.

title: Research Student Assistant
description: Researched about Optimization Algorithms in ML, created a new algorithm and published a paper on it to a Springer Nature Journal.
